head.title: School Closure Updates – School Closure Updates – El Monte City School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: El Monte City School District is located in El Monte, CA.

'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js'; var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s); })();

li.a: School Calendar - Holidays & Student Free Days

div.style: color: #000000; font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; background-color: #ffffff

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: April 2, 2020

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Dear El Monte City School District Community,

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: I hope you and your families are doing well during these challenging times. In the past few days, our state and county leaders

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #2b2b2b; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: respectively shared their recommendation for schools to remain closed and continue providing instruction through a distance learning program until the end of the 2019-20 school year.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: El Monte City School District will be following these recommendations and our campuses will be closed through the remainder of the year, June 5, 2020.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 12pt 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We understand that this decision will pose hardships for our students, families, and our District team. It is not an ideal situation, nor is it one we would have wanted for our students. However, the health, safety, and well-being of our students, staff, and community continue to be our top priority.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 12pt

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: During this time, we will put all efforts into strengthening our delivery of instruction through distance learning. While our classrooms and schools may be physically closed, our desire to educate and be connected with our students is still our primary focus. We want to ensure that all students are still connecting with their teachers and that learning is still happening. We will continue to offer instructional and enrichment activities to students during our closure.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: This may include interacting through the use of computer and communications technology, as well as supporting instruction and check-in time with their teacher.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Please be sure that your child is connecting with his or her teacher, and contact the District office at (626) 453-3700 or email at

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: if you need assistance connecting with your child’s teacher.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 12pt

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: As we move towards the next phase of our distance learning plan, we will be working to ensure that our students have the technological means to connect with their teachers. In the coming weeks, we will be providing guidelines on how to check out devices and accessing the internet.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px 0px 12pt; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Our Grab and Go meal program will continue, ensuring that all children, 18 years and younger, have access to meals. This program will continue Monday through Friday from 9 a.m. to noon at the following schools:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Durfee School - 12233 Star St., El Monte, CA 91732

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Gidley School - 10226 E. Lower Azusa Ave., El Monte, CA 91731

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Potrero School - 2611 N. Potrero Ave., El Monte, CA 91733

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Shirpser School - 4020 Gibson Rd, El Monte, CA 91731

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 12pt 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Our partner high school district is also distributing meals at the following schools:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: El Monte High School -

span.style: font-size: 11pt; color: #3c4043; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: 3048 Tyler Avenue, El Monte, CA 91731

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Arroyo High School -

span.style: font-size: 11pt; color: #222222; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: 4921 Cedar Ave, El Monte, CA 91732

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: South El Monte High School -

span.style: font-size: 11pt; color: #222222; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: 1001 Durfee Ave, South El Monte, CA 91733

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 12pt 0px 0px; padding: 0px 0px 12pt

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: All of this information, along with other instructional resources for your children and family can be found on our website at

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #333333; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: . Please visit our website often to get the most up to date information.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 12pt

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: We are all facing unprecedented challenges during unsettled times. Please know that the El Monte City School District stands with you. Our district office is open for calls from 8 am to 12 pm Monday through Friday. You can also email any questions or concerns at info@emcsd.org.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Thank you so much for your support during these challenging times. I am extraordinarily grateful for our El Monte City School District community

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 12pt 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Sincerely,

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 12pt

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Dr. Maribel Garcia, Superintendent

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Queridas Familias del Distrito de El Monte,

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Espero que usted y sus familias se encuentren bien durante estos tiempos difíciles.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: En los últimos días, líderes del estado y condado anunciaron la recomendación de cerrar las escuelas hasta fin del año escolar 2019-20, y que la enseñanza continúe con programas de aprendizaje a distancia. El Distrito de la Ciudad de El Monte a determinado seguir las recomendaciones de cerrar las escuelas hasta el fin de año, el 5 de junio del 2020.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Entendemos la situación difícil que esta decisión causara para nuestros estudiantes, familias y nuestro equipo aquí en el distrito. No es la situación ideal, ni siquiera lo que esperábamos para nuestros niños. Sin embargo, la prioridad de nuestro distrito continúa siendo la salud, seguridad, y bienestar de nuestros estudiantes, personal y comunidad.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Durante este tiempo, nuestro enfoque ha sido establecer nuestro programa de enseñanza a pesar de la distancia usando tecnología. Aunque nuestros salones y escuelas están cerradas físicamente, nuestra pasión hacia la enseñanza de nuestros niños no ha cambiado. Sigue siendo nuestro enfoque. Queremos que todos los estudiantes se sientan conectados con sus maestros, y que sigan aprendiendo. Continuaremos a ofrecer instrucción y actividades de aprendizaje durante el cierre de las escuelas. Esto puede incluir conexión con los maestros a través de la computadora, recibir instrucción usando tecnología, y tiempo para que su niño pueda conectar con su maestro. Por favor asegúrese que su hijo ha tenido contacto con su maestro. Si esto no ha ocurrido, por favor comuniquese con nosotros al (626) 453- 3700 o por correo electrónico

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Estamos estableciendo la próxima etapa de nuestro plan de educación distanciada. En las próximas semanas, queremos asegurarnos que nuestros estudiantes tengan acceso a la tecnología para poder comunicarse con sus maestros. Vamos a compartir guianza para que pueden conectarse al internet.

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

p.span: Seguimos ofreciendo nuestras comidas de “Grab and Go” para todos los niños de 18 años para abajo. Este programa continua de lunes a viernes, de 9:00 am hasta el mediodía en las siguientes escuelas:

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Durfee School - 12233 Star St., El Monte, CA 91732

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Gidley School - 10226 E. Lower Azusa Ave., El Monte, CA 91731

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: Shirpser School - 4020 Gibson Rd, El Monte, CA 91731

p.style: color: #222222; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: #ffffff; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; line-height: 1.38; margin: 0px; padding: 0px

p.span: Nuestro distrito asociado de las escuelas secundarias también ofrecerá comidas de “Grab and Go”en las siguientes escuelas:

li.span: 3048 Tyler Avenue, El Monte, CA 91731

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

span.style: font-size: 11pt; color: #222222; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

li.span: 4921 Cedar Ave, El Monte, CA 91732

div.span: Esta información y recursos adicionales de instrucción para las familias y niños pueden ser encontradas en nuestro sitio web

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #1c1e21; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

div.span: Todos estamos encarando dificultades en estos tiempos sin precedente. Por favor asegurense que el Distrito Escolar de la Ciudad de El Monte está con ustedes. Nuestra oficina del distrito está abierta para recibir llamadas de 8:00 am a 12:00 pm de lunes a viernes. También nos pueden encontrar con nuestro correo electrónico en

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

div.span: Gracias por su apoyo durante esta etapa. Estoy extremadamente agradecida por nuestra comunidad.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Century Gothic', sans-serif; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap

Call (855) 502-7867 Follow Voice prompts to opt back in *Must call using the phone you want to opt-in from
BlackBoard Connect Opt-Out
Option 1- Call (855) 502-7867 Opt out by answering call and following voice prompts at end of call to opt out
Option 2- Contact Natalie Garcia ngarcia2@emcsd.org or ext. 3655 to opt out of calls *Reminder- by opting out you will NOT get any calls/notifications at all.
